hero_content: I am a Java Backend Developer with a passion for mastering backend systems and architecture. With a focus on delivering efficient, scalable, and maintainable applications, I am committed to building high-quality solutions that drive performance and reliability. My expertise spans Java and key backend technologies, and I continually strive for improvement through hands-on learning and professional development. As I work to become an expert in the field, I aim to contribute meaningfully to impactful, challenging projects.
about_text: As a Java Backend Developer, I specialize in crafting robust, scalable, and high-performance applications using Java and related technologies. My career journey began with an intense curiosity about system architecture, which evolved into a focus on backend development. With hands-on experience in Java, Spring, and database technologies, I thrive in solving complex problems and optimizing system performance. I believe in continuous learning and actively seek opportunities to grow my skill set. Outside of development, I’m passionate about sports, particularly weighted Calisthenics, where I focus on pushing my limits and balancing personal well-being with productivity.

experiences.description: As a Junior Java Backend Developer, I design and develop Java-based backend applications using Spring Boot. I focus on building and integrating RESTful APIs, performing unit and integration tests to ensure high code quality, and collaborating in agile teams. Additionally, I conduct code reviews to ensure maintainability and adherence to best practices.

In my apprenticeship, I gained extensive experience in Java, Spring, and SQL, while working with modern development tools like Maven, Git, Docker, and Postman. I contributed to both backend and frontend projects, focused on writing unit tests (JUnit), applied security concepts, and developed UI/UX with a strong foundation in project management methodologies.

This experience was key in shaping my decision to pursue a career in programming. It provided me with a deep understanding of programming principles, starting with C, and helped me develop a solid foundation in both embedded systems and general software development.

experiences.role: State-certified Electrical Engineering Assistant (Focus on Electronics and Data Technology)
experiences.description: My journey in programming began here, where I worked with C++, HTML, CSS, SQL, and PHP. I explored web development by creating a website for a fictitious startup and delved into SQL and PHP for backend development. I also gained hands-on experience with Linux, setting up file access through the command line and exploring distribution systems.
